name: HELL INTERVIEW 1000: SPEED SACRIFICE CELEBRATION
description:
You have gathered seven human would-be HELL DEMONS in a dimly lit room. This is their chance to show what they've got! One of three TERRIBLE BEASTS will lay out their criteria, and it's up to you to interview the volunteers and choose only the most ELIGIBLE candidate! Oh yeah! It's time for Human Sacrifice!

  • GAMEPLAY:
    -A demon from Hell will describe to you their perfect sacrifice.
    -You will have 4 chances to ask everyone in the room a question. Choose carefully! Their answers will reveal their personality...
    -Click on a candidate to disqualify them if they're not what you're looking for.
    -When only the perfect candidate remains, click sacrifice to send them to Hell!
  • FEATURES:
    -3 Monsters with unique dialog
    -Randomly generated human sacrifices
    -The dialogue was broken when I pressing Sacrifice so it just skips to the next round. I need to fix that .  sorry
    -HAND DRAWN art on PAPER!!     (neither of us has a mouse)

Made by Kimera Royal & LFOB
